name: get_team_receiving_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nfl_team_stats_v2.
Tool description: NFL Team Stats is an API that always provides up-to-date stats for all NFL teams such as: Wins, Passing, Rushing and Recieving.
API description: Provides a JSON Response containg a list of all teams' receiving data. Parameters include whether you'd like the data for offense or defense sides, and a specific year.

The side parameter should be one of these two options: "offense" or "defense"
The year parameter should be a year between these years: 1920 - current year.

side.description: Specifies whether to fetch data for offensive or defensive teams. Must be either "offense" or "defense".

year.description: The year for which to fetch the data. Must be between 1920 and the current year.
